name: Koby
text: On Play: Up to 1 of your Characters can attack one of your opponent's active Characters this turn. When Attacking: You may return 2 cards from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order. Give your Leader or up to 1 of your Characters +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

effect.text: Up to 1 of your Characters can attack one of your opponent's active Characters this turn.
You may return 2 cards from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order. Give your Leader or up to 1 of your Characters +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

powerMod.duration: until the end of your opponent's next turn
